name: Behind the Times
description: This smooth twist on the classic Up to Date drops the rye and sherry in favor of Irish whisky and Dolin Blanc vermouth.
recipeIngredient: 2 dashes Dram Apothecary Hair of the Dog bitters (see note)

recipeInstructions.text: Add Irish whiskey, Dolin Blanc, dry curaçao, and bitters to a mixing glass. Fill 2/3 full with ice and stir until well chilled, about 20 seconds.
Strain into a chilled cocktail glass. Garnish with lemon twist and serve.
